item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.paypal.me/ukestuff or https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Elton John - Rocket Man
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Rocket Man - Elton John Written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin
Using the chords: Am7 C D Dm F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Huey Lewis & The News - Stuck With You
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of C & D.
Chords Used: C, Am7, F, Dm, G, Am, Em, A, D, Bm7
As performed by Huey Lewis and the News.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/FaNEwVl1sR0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Toon Tunes - The Flintstones
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C (Transposed down from the original).
Chords Used: G, C, Dm7, D7, G7, Dm, Em, F, E7, A7, Am7, Fm
The theme song from The Flintstones.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/SxhKRWp3zx0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Andie Case - Complicated
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. Lowered slightly from the Nightcore original.
Chords Used: G, Em, C, D, Dsus4, Em7, Am7
Original Performance by Avril Lavigne; Nightcore version by Andy Case.
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature all video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (GCEA chords & Strumming/Finger Picking): https://youtu.be/-z6dC9kb7Og
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from newlifechurch.tv/resources/motion-backgrounds
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Times Like These - Foo Fighters - Ukulele Play-Along
item.description: Chords: Am, Am7, C, D, Em (C5) Strumming suggestions included. Also see strumming support video at https://youtu.be/TpRkwfHJsuw

item.title: Leo Bambo - Bamboleo
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Bamboleo on the ukulele by The Gypsy Kings. The chords used are Em C D7 Bb Gmaj7 Am Am7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Amos Lee - Sweet Pea
item.description:
Simplified the chords slightly and took out the Barre chord.
This tutorial will show you how to play Sweet Pea on the ukulele by Amos Lee. The chords used are G D7 B7 A7 Em7 Am7. Original in E.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Lee Greenwood - God Bless The USA
item.description:
For educational use.
Lee Greenwood singing God Bless The USA, with the pitch raised 1 whole step so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Lyric video by YouTuber “Jesus4Life” (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MYvUmhqa104).
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Chicago - 25 or 6 to 4
item.description: Am, Am6, Am7, E7, F, C, G
